title: Modern Eco-Friendly Duplex with Landscaped Views in Vibrant Ursynów
description: Discover an elegantly designed duplex offering five spacious bedrooms and two full bathrooms, perfectly blending modern finishes with eco-conscious living. With a well-balanced layout across two levels and approximately 160 sqm of living space, the home is flooded with natural light. Enjoy an open-plan living and dining area—ideal for social gatherings—with access to private greenery.
neighborhood_description: Situated in the dynamic, trendy Ursynów district of Warsaw, this property puts vibrant local life at your doorstep while affording peace and tranquility. Close proximity to waterfront leisure spots, top-rated schools, and abundant shopping provides excellent convenience for young families and couples. Extensive green areas and cycling paths make this an inviting community to work, relax, and connect.
lifestyle_benefits: step outside to bike and running trails
energy-efficient features leading to reduced bills
target_buyer: Designed for young eco-conscious couples looking for a vibrant urban lifestyle, with potential for travelers or families that value flexible space and a sustainable, low-maintenance environment.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity in Warsaw's Ursynów district—this duplex merges sustainability with contemporary comfort, ideal for urbanites seeking a stylish modern home within a lively, connected suburb near central transport links.
